item.title: Build your private LTE network for IIOT
item.description: Abstract: In some specfied conditions, the tele operator is considering share/reserve some spectrum resource to the IIOT(Industry IoT)applicance, like the NB-IoT/eMTC tech defined by 3GPP stardard.
